type.description:
apoli:modify_velocity
Modifies all velocity in a specified axis.
Power Types are what grants functionality to your origins! Each power has a type, specified with a type field in the JSON. Which type a power is defines which other fields it requires and supports.
type.markdownDescription:
### `apoli:modify_velocity`
Modifies all velocity in a specified axis.
## Power Type
Power Types are what grants functionality to your origins! Each power has a type, specified with a type field in the JSON. Which type a power is defines which other fields it requires and supports.

[Power Type Documentation](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/json/power/)

axis.description: Used to specify the axes affected by this modifier.

modifier.description: Modifies all velocity in a specified axis.

modifiers.description: If specified, these modifiers will apply to the specified axes.
